org.intermine.bio.io.gff3

Class GFF3Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.bio.io.gff3.GFF3Parser

  • public final class GFF3Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    A parser for GFF3 files. This code was taken from Matthew Pocock's GFF3 parser in BioJava.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Iterator<?> parse(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
      Read GFF3 lines from a BufferedReader and return an Iterator over the GFF3Records.

        public static java.util.Iterator<?> parse(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Read GFF3 lines from a BufferedReader and return an Iterator over the GFF3Records.
        Parameters:
        reader - the Reader to reader from
        Returns:
